Html:
Hello,

I am currently deep into a project using WPF and the June 2008 release of prisim. I am wondering if anyone has had any experience upgrading mid project and had any insight. Normally I would not even consider it at this time, however I need to create a new region this iteration and was pretty excited about the RegionPopupBehaviors. I have not read all of the new documentation yet but from what I have so far it looks like there are a fair number of substantial changes. Anyone have any insight on this?

 

Thanks,

Brette
You may just want to check into the source of that one behavior to see if it is feasible to bring a part of it into the project so you don't have to sustain a complete upgrade.
